description: A humorous punchline about a child refusing nap time.
title: Resisting a Rest
n_1: Mom tries to get Tommy to take a nap.
c1_1: Tommy, it's time for your nap.
n_2: Mom gently tucks Tommy into bed.
c1_2: Just close your eyes and rest.
n_3: Tommy squirms in bed, refusing to sleep.
c1_4: You need your sleep, little one.
